channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Microsoft’s New Xbox Series X and Series S Consoles Are on Sale Now (2024)
item.description: A mid-cycle refresh of the company’s gaming console offers extra storage and a slightly lower price. But is an Xbox even worth it in 2024?

item.title: A Rubberized Cybertruck Is Ploughing Through European Pedestrian Safety Rules
item.description: Tesla’s troubled electric pickup is illegal in Europe, yet somehow a barely modified model has found a way to get licensed. A group of European transp...

item.title: Amplitude buys Command AI to bolster its app engagement offerings
item.description: Amplitude, a publicly-traded company that makes digital analytics software, has acquired Command AI, an app user engagement startup formerly known as ...

item.title: DC Entertainment Is Changing the Shape—and Scrollability—of Comics
item.description: DC has cut a deal with GlobalComix, a company that optimizes comics to be scrolled vertically. Everyone from Batman to The Joker is headed to this pla...

item.title: New iPad mini brings support for Apple Intelligence and Pencil
item.description: Apple Tuesday unveiled a new version of the iPad mini updated for the era of Apple Intelligence. The arrival is powered by the A7 Pro chip, bringing c...

item.title: Oura Ring 4 Review: A More Accurate and Wearable Smart Ring
item.description: Many software and hardware updates to the latest Oura ring make it more accurate, useful, and easier to wear.

item.title: Instagram’s latest feature is a digital business card for your profile

item.title: The New York Times has had it with generative AI companies using its content

item.title: Apple iPad Mini (2024): Specs, Release Date, Price, Features
item.description: Not much has changed with Apple's tiniest tablet, but the A17 Pro chip brings support for new AI features.

item.title: India backs Musk in satellite spectrum allocation row
